entry.title: Bohème Roller
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: Essential Oil Rollers
Price: 15.00

"I am a wild woman, it would take a warrior to tame my spirit."
- Nikki Rowe
☾

She is rich in knowledge, her intuition is strong, she is independent.  She shook off her chains of oppression and stepped into her full power.

This beautiful roller comes with a special blend of pure essential oils and contains energetically cleansed rainbow moonstone crystals.  Apply to the back of your neck, base of your throat, wrists, heart chakra and behind your ears.  Apply to hands and inhale while doing some deep belly breathing.

Relax, breathe, and reconnect with your feminine power.  You are magic.

10mL

ingredients: fractionated coconut oil, rainbow moonstone, essential oils of: citrus aurantium bergamia (bergamot), citrus sinensis (orange), boswellia carterii (frankincense), rosa damascena (rose), cananga odorata (ylang ylang), jasmina officinale (jasmine).

Please note:  As every person is individual please start slow with essential oils and cease use immediately if you notice any negative effects.

entry.title: Jasmine
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: New Releases
Price: 22.00

"Some women fear the fire, some women simply become it."
☾

Mother Nature has made the most rich and sensual perfume from 'plants that wake when others sleep'.  Jasmine is known for being an aphrodisiac and is associated with love, beauty & sensuality.  Apply to pulse points as you would with regular perfume, be sure to inhale and remember the goddess that you are.  

This beautiful 10ml roller comes with a special blend of pure essential oils and contains energetically cleansed rose quartz crystals.

Ingredients include: Fractionated Coconut Oil, Rose Quartz Crystal, Jasmina Officinale Grandiflorum (Jasmine Essential Oil)

Please note:  As every person is individual please start slow with essential oils and cease use immediately if you notice any negative effects.

entry.title: Rose
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: New Releases
Price: 33.00

"She might be built for seduction, but she was made for love."
- Jonny Ox
☾

Rose enhances the mood, "The Queen of flowers" evokes a sense of enchantment and is considered a symbol of balance & harmony.  Intoxicating and romantic, rose is one of the most precious oils in the world.  Apply to pulse points as your daily perfume.

This beautiful roller comes with pure essential oils and contains energetically cleansed rose quartz crystals.

10mL

Ingredients include: Fractionated Coconut Oil, Rose Quartz Crystal, Rosa Damascena (Bulgarian rose oil).

Please note:  As every person is individual please start slow with essential oils and cease use immediately if you notice any negative effects.

entry.title: Calm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: Essential Oil Rollers
Price: 15.00

"You are the sky.  Everything else - it's just the weather."
- Pema Chödrön
☾

We all experience times of stress and overwhelm and how it can de-rail our day.  We hear you and support you to get back to your powerful, goddess-self.

This beautiful roller comes with a special blend of pure essential oils and contains energetically cleansed amethyst crystals.  Apply to the back of your neck, wrists, heart chakra or temples.  Apply to hands and inhale while doing some deep belly breathing.

Relax, breathe, and reconnect with your intuition.  You are knowing.

10mL

ingredients: fractionated coconut oil, amethyst, essential oils of: citrus reticulata (tangerine), citrus sinensis (orange), cananga odorata (ylang ylang), picea mariana (black spruce), lavandula augustifolia (lavender), tanacetum annuum (blue tansy).

Please note:  As every person is individual please start slow with essential oils and cease use immediately if you notice any negative effects.

entry.title: Wellness
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: Essential Oil Rollers
Price: 15.00

"To keep the body in good health is a duty otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear."
- Buddha
☾

Perfect to apply as extra protection coming into the cooler months.  Assists to support a healthy immune system.  

This beautiful roller comes with a special blend of pure essential oils and contains energetically cleansed amethyst crystal.

10mL

ingredients: fractionated coconut oil, amethyst, syzygium aromaticum (clove), citrus limon (lemon), cinnamomum zeylanicum (cinnamon), eucalyptus radiata (eucalyptus), omarinus officinalis (rosemary), copaifera reticulata (copaiba), satureja montana (mountain savory), origanum vulgare (oregano).

Apply to soles of feet, chest, back & neck

Please note:  As every person is individual please start slow with essential oils and cease use immediately if you notice any negative effects.

entry.title: Sleep
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: Essential Oil Rollers
Price: 15.00

"Sleep is the best meditation."
- Dalai Lama
☾

If you're not sleeping well then you can't be performing well or feeling great.  Create a sense of restful peace at bedtime by applying this beauty as your head hits the pillow.  Quiet the mind and create a sense of calm.  

This beautiful roller comes with a special blend of pure essential oils and contains energetically cleansed amethyst crystals.

10mL

ingredients: fractionated coconut oil, amethyst, lavandula augustifolia (lavender), cedars atlantica (cedarwood), chamaemelum nobile (roman chamomile).

Apply to your temples and forehead, wrists, chest or soles of feet.  Apply to hands and inhale for extra benefit. 

Please note:  As every person is individual please start slow with essential oils and cease use immediately if you notice any negative effects.

entry.title: Self Love
entry.summary:
Vendor: Botanist Aromatherapy
Type: Essential Oil Rollers
Price: 15.00

"You have been criticising yourself for years, and it hasn’t worked. Try approving of yourself and see what happens.”
– Louise L. Hay

☾

Perfect to apply when you are needing a little self love.  This is an uplifting blend that can help to lift your self esteem and remind you to fill your cup.  Take a moment to appreciate all that you are and all that you can be.  I particularly like this blend to use during meditation or as my daily perfume.

This beautiful glass roller contains a special blend of essential oils and energetically cleansed rose quartz crystal.

10mL

ingredients: fractionated coconut oil, rose quartz, boswellia carterii (frankincense), citrus aurantium bergamia (bergamot), lavandula augustifolia (lavender), cananga oderata (ylang ylang), coriandrum sativum (coriander), abies balsamea (balsam fir), pelargonium graveolens (geranium).

apply to wrists, behind ears, chest & neck

Please note:  As every person is individual please start slow with essential oils and cease use immediately if you notice any negative effects.
